about_the_game:
One Card One Shot - Mafia: An electrifying mix of Card Game and Sniper! Fast and intuitive, it will test your reflexes and strategy, where the decision of life or death is just one click away!

Take on the role of a relentless bounty hunter in the mafia underworld. With your wits, a trusty weapon, and a deck of cards, your goal is to hunt down crime bosses. Get ready, as they won’t go down without a fight!

GAMEPLAY:

In this fast-paced and electrifying game, you must be quick to survive. Use your cards strategically and fire the fatal shot at the right moment. With each mission completed, you rise in the Most Wanted rankings, unlocking more lucrative and challenging jobs. But beware, every success attracts even more dangerous enemies!

MAFIA BOSSES:

Advance through unique worlds within each card and face mafia bosses loaded with challenges! Overcome obstacles and discover distinct new scenarios, where each boss rules over a territory full of dangers and puzzles.

MAX INTENSITY -> FPS MODE:

Experience the action up close! At key moments, the game shifts to a first-person perspective, increasing immersion and testing your aim and reflexes in electrifying combat!

BUILD YOUR HUNTING DECK

In each mission, carefully select cards for your hunting deck, each with unique effects. Build the perfect strategy for each job by combining skills to maximize your chances of success!

MORE FEATURES:

We’re developing exciting new features for this game! Here’s what you can expect:

  • Guaranteed variety! Face different targets in every game, with thousands of possible combinations.

  • A deck full of cards for you to create innovative strategies and have fun every time!

  • Face a new world and unique challenges with every mafia boss, leading up to the dreaded Big Boss.

  • Stay sharp: the characters in the cards will try to escape and interact with the environment.

  • Be quick and observant: your targets can use special cards to counterattack or flee. Your reaction must be immediate!

  • Boost your notoriety: earn rewards, acquire new cards, climb the Most Wanted rankings, and become a legend!

COMMUNITY:

Want to help develop the game and join exclusive promotions and closed beta tests? Join us on Discord and become part of our community!

content_descriptors.notes: In this game there will be, shots, blood and crimes.

short_description: Explore the mafia underworld in an electrifying mix of Card Game and Sniper! Fast and intuitive, perfect for quick fun or hours of gameplay. Choose your mission, build your deck, and face challenges until you take down the mafia boss. Each flipped card holds surprises. Ready for the challenge?
